about.idesign: I design and build digital products and user interfaces. Whenever I do it I go into a flow state. I love what I do.
about.coder: Development of complex, dynamic and scalable sites with html, css, sass, js and the React framework. Modern applications with Node.js and MongoDB. Server-side JavaScript development. and SQL and NoSQL databases.
about.courseit: Creation of websites with html, css, JS and React. Use of git and github. Class components.
